Title: Pokemon no Heisei-shi: Kayou Kara Mokuyou, Soshite Nichiyou e
Description: ['In this special, we will present carefully selected stories from the currently airing series ', Pocket Monsters Sun & Moon, ', as well as from the past series, picking from over 1000 episodes.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' We will look back at the grand adventure Satoshi and Pikachu have been on from the beginning back in April 1997 all the way up till today.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' We will also present precious, never-before-seen clips of Pok√©mon and characters that carry the fate of ', Pocket Monsters Sun & Moon, '.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: Serebii)']
